attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 31 states in usa have no compulsion.in a high speed impact the weight of the helmet can & will incease brain roll,damaging the spinal column .it should be left to the individual  to make an informed decision on ,what they wear as it is part of your freedom of choice,sikhs dont wear them on religious grounds which is discriminatory

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/all-helmets/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
